string-array.name: data_description
string-array.item: Carhartt known for its durable and quality workwear, Carhartt has become a staple in street fashion for its rugged aesthetic.
Stussy, a pioneering brand in the streetwear culture, has been influential in shaping urban fashion worldwide.
CPFM, or Cactus Plant Flea Market, blends whimsical designs with streetwear aesthetics, creating unique, high-demand pieces.
Supreme, an iconic streetwear brand, is famous for its limited releases and collaborations that draw lines around blocks.
Bathing Ape, or BAPE, a brand known for its camo patterns and ape logo, is a symbol of street luxury.
Rhude mixes luxury techniques with streetwear elements, focusing on minimalistic designs with attention to detail.
Aime Leon Dore is a brand that combines timeless aesthetics with contemporary fashion, embodying effortless style.
NOAH brings an eco-conscious approach to street fashion, merging classic menswear with bold graphics and designs.
Chrome Hearts is known for its high fashion approach to streetwear, often incorporating oversized silhouettes and ironic graphics.
Vetements is known for its high fashion approach to streetwear, often incorporating oversized silhouettes and ironic graphics.
